CustomField.description: Formula field to sum all report fee fields on the property advance
CustomField.formula: Property_Condition_Report_Fee__c + PCR_Report_Fee__c + Budget_Review_Report_Fee__c + Zoning_Report_Fee__c + Geotechnical_Report_Fee__c + Seismic_Report_Fee__c + Survey_Report_Fee__c + Phase_1_Report_Fee__c + Phase_2_Report_Fee__c
CustomField.label: Report Fee Total
